Package javax.jaxtx.model.btp.opt

Interface Summary
Decider This is the interface that all cohesions provide in order that they can be driven to completion.
Inferior This is the interface that all inferiors must implement in order to be driven through the two-phase completion protocol.
Superior This is the interface that all superiors provide.
Transaction The Transaction is the interface that most participants will see.
TransactionManager This is the interface that application servers/web services will use to communicate with the underlying transaction system.
 

Exception Summary
DeciderCancelledException Thrown if all of the inferiors mentioned in prepare or confirm decide to cancel.
DeciderConfirmedException Thrown if all of the inferiors mentioned in prepare or cancel decide to confirm.
DuplicateInferiorException Thrown if an inferior is registered multiple times.
InferiorCancelledException Thrown if an inferior cancels rather than confirming or preparing.
InferiorConfirmedException Thrown if an inferior confirms rather than cancelling or preparing.
InvalidDeciderException  
InvalidInferiorException Thrown if the inferior identifier is invalid within the scope it has been used.
InvalidSuperiorException Thrown if the superior identifier is invalid within the scope it has been used.
